summary:
Keyleth: *hugs Vex from behind* Morning babe
Vex'ahlia: Morning Keyleth
Keyleth: ...shit
Vex'ahlia: so
Keyleth: please...
body:
Keyleth: *hugs Vex from behind* Morning babe
Vex'ahlia: Morning Keyleth
Keyleth: ...shit
Vex'ahlia: so
Keyleth: please no
Vex'ahlia: I never knew you felt this way ;)
Keyleth: fuck no i take it back
Vex'ahlia: our love is forbidden but strong
Vax'ildan: ...babe?
Vex'ahlia: she's mine now brother :D

summary: but if i were that kind of grateful, what would i try to say? - elsinorerose - Critical Role (Web Series) [Archive of Our Own]
title: but if i were that kind of grateful, what would i try to say? - elsinorerose - Critical Role (Web Series) [Archive of Our Own]
excerpt: An Archive of Our Own, a project of the Organization for Transformative Works
description:
“Dawn is near. It is achingly beautiful, with little stray snowflakes floating down every few minutes. They remind him of ashes.

Please, he thinks, just get me to the caves before the sun rises. Let me do this one thing right.”

part 5 of out there in the dark

tags: my dumbass just wants molly back
summary: Critical Role Head Canon that probably isn't true but I wish it was:
body:
Critical Role Head Canon that probably isn’t true but I wish it was:

Molly actually did come back from the dead but can’t remember anything and is now on his own adventure probably doing some really mundane, average life kinda shit, like tailoring or a library worker.

[I’m super behind so don’t mind if this is wrong or anything uwu]

blog.name: kimabutch
blog.title: Revolutionary
blog.description: I'm Charlie! I'm attempting to tag "cr spoilers" until the subsequent Tuesday, but don't expect perfection. I'm into a lot of things — right now it's mostly Critical Role, but Utena still owns my heart. 22, butch lesbian, she/her. Link to asks!

summary: How about I'm Still Here by Johnny Rzeznik for Beau? Or Eight by Sleeping At Last for Caleb and Beau
question: How about I'm Still Here by Johnny Rzeznik for Beau? Or Eight by Sleeping At Last for Caleb and Beau
answer:
OH YES thank you!!! Beau even almost has Jim Hawkins hair, and definitely the attitude! Defiant songs about growing up work so well for Beau and… jeez, now I’m doubly emotional about this song.

Favourite lines for Beau:

“And how can the world want me to change?/ 
They’re the ones that stay the same/ 
They don’t know me ‘cause I’m not here”

And, for Beau coming to love the M9 and letting them see who she really is:

“And you see the things they never see/ 
All you wanted, I could be/ 
Now you know me, and I’m not afraid/ 
And I want to tell you who I am”

And man, I’d never heard of Sleeping at Last before this playlist project, but this is introducing me to so many good songs from them (we’ve got like, half of an entire album by them, I think, and I’m NOT complaining.)

Anyways, I’m so emotional about Eight and Caleb & Beau’s guarded friendship where they’ve finally let each other in.

“I can’t let you in, I swore never again/ 
I can’t afford to let myself be blindsided/ 
I’m standing guard, I’m falling apart/ 
And all I want is to trust you/ 
Show me how to lay my sword down/ 
For long enough to let you through/ 
Here I am, pry me open/ 
What do you want to know?”

I love these Empire Kids!!!!!!!!!!

Come yell at me about the songs that remind you of Critical Role! I’m making a giant playlist! (Song masterpost | CR music tag)

blog.name: bruhchantite
blog.description: She silently stares at you as she takes all the milk from your fridge before slowly disappearing through your window. You do not know where she came from. You do not know where she belongs. Your sister let her in. It's like having a cat in the house. But with less horrid dead mice.
